   289â†’        trigger_config: Dict[str, Any],
   290â†’        profile: Dict[str, Any],
   291â†’        conditions: Optional[List[Dict]] = None,
   292â†’        user_timezone: str = "Asia/Shanghai",
   293â†’    ) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[Dict[str, Any]], Optional[str]]:
   294â†’        """
   295â†’        è¯„ä¼°è§¦å‘æ¡ä»¶
   296â†’
   297â†’        Returns:
   298â†’            (triggered: bool, event_info: Optional[Dict], idempotent_key: Optional[str])
   299â†’        """
   300â†’        trigger_type = trigger_config.get("type")
   301â†’
   302â†’        # 1. æ—¶é—´è§¦å‘ï¼šç¡®å®šæ€§ cron åŒ¹é…
   303â†’        if trigger_type == "time_based":
   304â†’            matched, bucket_key = self._evaluate_cron(
   305â†’                trigger_config.get("schedule"),
   306â†’                user_timezone
   307â†’            )
   308â†’            if not matched:
   309â†’                return False, None, None
   310â†’            # ç»§ç»­è¯„ä¼° conditions
   311â†’            if conditions:
   312â†’                cond_result = await self._evaluate_conditions(conditions, profile)
   313â†’                return cond_result, None, bucket_key
   314â†’            return True, None, bucket_key
   315â†’
   316â†’        # 2. äº‹ä»¶è§¦å‘ï¼šç¡®å®šæ€§äº‹ä»¶æ£€æµ‹
   317â†’        if trigger_type == "event_based":
   318â†’            return await self._evaluate_event(trigger_config, profile, conditions)
   319â†’
   320â†’        # 3. æ•°æ®æ¡ä»¶è§¦å‘
   321â†’        if trigger_type == "data_condition":

   323â†’            return result, None, None
   324â†’
   325â†’        return False, None, None
   326â†’
   327â†’    def _evaluate_cron(
   328â†’        self,
   329â†’        schedule: str,
   330â†’        user_timezone: str,
   331â†’    ) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[str]]:
   332â†’        """
   333â†’        ç¡®å®šæ€§ cron åŒ¹é…ï¼ˆå¸¦æ—¶åŒºï¼‰
   334â†’
   335â†’        Returns:
   336â†’            (matched: bool, bucket_key: str) - bucket_key ç”¨äºå¹‚ç­‰å»é‡
   337â†’        """
   338â†’        if not schedule:
   339â†’            return False, None
   340â†’
   341â†’        try:
   342â†’            tz = pytz.timezone(user_timezone)
   343â†’            now = datetime.now(tz)
   344â†’
   345â†’            cron = croniter.croniter(schedule, now)
   346â†’            prev_time = cron.get_prev(datetime)
   347â†’
   348â†’            # è®¡ç®—æ—¶é—´æ¡¶ï¼ˆåˆ†é’Ÿçº§ç²¾åº¦ï¼‰
   349â†’            bucket_key = prev_time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M")
   350â†’
   351â†’            # è¯¯å·®çª—å£ä¸æ‰«æé¢‘ç‡å¯¹é½ï¼ˆå‡è®¾æ¯åˆ†é’Ÿæ‰«æï¼Œè¯¯å·® â‰¤60sï¼‰
   352â†’            matched = (now - prev_time).total_seconds() < 60
   353â†’
   354â†’            return matched, bucket_key
   355â†’        except Exception:
   356â†’            return False, None
   357â†’
   358â†’    async def _evaluate_conditions(
   359â†’        self,
   360â†’        conditions: List[Dict],
   361â†’        profile: Dict[str, Any],
   362â†’    ) -> bool:
   363â†’        """
   364â†’        æ¡ä»¶è¯„ä¼°ï¼šé™æ€ä¼˜å…ˆï¼ŒLLM å›é€€
   365â†’
   366â†’        æµç¨‹:
   367â†’        1. é¢„å¤„ç†å ä½ç¬¦ï¼ˆ{today}, {now}ï¼‰
   368â†’        2. é™æ€æ¡ä»¶ç›´æ¥æ±‚å€¼
   369â†’        3. å¤æ‚æ¡ä»¶å›é€€ LLM
   370â†’        4. æ‰€æœ‰æ¡ä»¶ AND é€»è¾‘
   371â†’        """
   372â†’        if not conditions:
   373â†’            return True
   374â†’
   375â†’        static_conditions = []
   376â†’        complex_conditions = []
   377â†’
   378â†’        # åˆ†ç±»æ¡ä»¶
   379â†’        for cond in conditions:
   380â†’            cond = self._preprocess_condition(cond)  # æ›¿æ¢å ä½ç¬¦
   381â†’            if self._is_static_condition(cond):
   382â†’                static_conditions.append(cond)
   383â†’            else:
   384â†’                complex_conditions.append(cond)
   385â†’
   386â†’        # 1. å…ˆæ±‚å€¼é™æ€æ¡ä»¶ï¼ˆçŸ­è·¯ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼‰
   387â†’        for cond in static_conditions:
   388â†’            if not self._static_eval(cond, profile):
   389â†’                return False  # çŸ­è·¯ï¼šé™æ€æ¡ä»¶ä¸æ»¡è¶³ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›
   390â†’
   391â†’        # 2. é™æ€æ¡ä»¶å…¨éƒ¨é€šè¿‡ï¼Œå†æ±‚å€¼å¤æ‚æ¡ä»¶
   392â†’        if complex_conditions and self.llm_service:
   393â†’            return await self._llm_eval_conditions(complex_conditions, profile)
   394â†’
   395â†’        return True
   396â†’
   397â†’    def _is_static_condition(self, cond: Dict) -> bool:
   398â†’        """åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå¯é™æ€æ±‚å€¼çš„æ¡ä»¶"""
   399â†’        return (
   400â†’            "data_path" in cond and
   401â†’            cond.get("operator", "exists") in STATIC_OPERATORS
   402â†’        )
   403â†’
   404â†’    def _preprocess_condition(self, cond: Dict) -> Dict:
   405â†’        """é¢„å¤„ç†å ä½ç¬¦"""
   406â†’        cond = cond.copy()
   407â†’        if "value" in cond:
   408â†’            value = str(cond["value"])
   409â†’            if "{today}" in value:
   410â†’                cond["value"] = value.replace("{today}", datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))
   411â†’            if "{now}" in value:
   412â†’                cond["value"] = value.replace("{now}", datetime.now().isoformat())
   413â†’        return cond
   414â†’
   415â†’    def _static_eval(self, cond: Dict, profile: Dict) -> bool:
   416â†’        """é™æ€æ¡ä»¶æ±‚å€¼"""
   417â†’        data_path = cond.get("data_path", "")
   418â†’        operator = cond.get("operator", "exists")
   419â†’        expected = cond.get("value")
   420â†’
   421â†’        # è·å–æ•°æ®
   422â†’        actual = self._get_nested_value(profile, data_path)
   423â†’
   424â†’        # æ±‚å€¼
   425â†’        if operator == "exists":
   426â†’            return actual is not None
   427â†’        if operator == "!exists":
   428â†’            return actual is None
   429â†’        if operator == "==":
   430â†’            return str(actual) == str(expected)
   431â†’        if operator == "!=":
   432â†’            return str(actual) != str(expected)
   433â†’        if operator == ">":
   434â†’            return float(actual or 0) > float(expected)
   435â†’        if operator == "<":
   436â†’            return float(actual or 0) < float(expected)
   437â†’        if operator == ">=":
   438â†’            return float(actual or 0) >= float(expected)
   439â†’        if operator == "<=":
   440â†’            return float(actual or 0) <= float(expected)
   441â†’        if operator == "contains":
   442â†’            return expected in str(actual or "")
   443â†’
   444â†’        return False
   445â†’
   446â†’    def _get_nested_value(self, data: Dict, path: str) -> Any:
   447â†’        """è·å–åµŒå¥—è·¯å¾„çš„å€¼"""
   448â†’        keys = path.split(".")
   449â†’        for key in keys:
   450â†’            if isinstance(data, dict):
   451â†’                data = data.get(key)
   452â†’            else:
   453â†’                return None
   454â†’        return data
   455â†’
   456â†’    async def _llm_eval_conditions(
   457â†’        self,
   458â†’        conditions: List[Dict],
   459â†’        profile: Dict,
   460â†’    ) -> bool:
   461â†’        """LLM è¯„ä¼°å¤æ‚æ¡ä»¶ï¼ˆä»…ç”¨äºæ— æ³•é™æ€æ±‚å€¼çš„æƒ…å†µï¼‰"""
   462â†’        # ç®€åŒ– promptï¼Œåªå‘é€ç›¸å…³æ•°æ®
   463â†’        prompt = f"""åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦æ»¡è¶³ä»¥ä¸‹æ¡ä»¶ï¼ˆå…¨éƒ¨æ»¡è¶³è¿”å› trueï¼‰ï¼š
   464â†’
   465â†’æ¡ä»¶ï¼š
   466â†’{chr(10).join(f"- {c.get('description', c)}" for c in conditions)}
   467â†’
   468â†’ç”¨æˆ·ç›¸å…³æ•°æ®ï¼š
   469â†’{self._extract_relevant_data(profile, conditions)}
   470â†’
   471â†’è¿”å› JSONï¼š{{"triggered": true/false, "reason": "..."}}"""
   472â†’
   473â†’        result = await self.llm_service.evaluate(prompt=prompt)
   474â†’        return result.get("triggered", False)
   475â†’
   476â†’    async def _evaluate_event(
   477â†’        self,
   478â†’        trigger_config: Dict,
   479â†’        profile: Dict,
   480â†’        conditions: Optional[List[Dict]],
   481â†’    ) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[Dict], Optional[str]]:
   482â†’        """
   483â†’        äº‹ä»¶è§¦å‘è¯„ä¼°
   484â†’
   485â†’        ä¼˜å…ˆä½¿ç”¨ç¡®å®šæ€§è®¡ç®—ï¼ˆç”Ÿæ—¥ã€èŠ‚æ°”ç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œ
   486â†’        ä»…å¯¹æ¨¡ç³Šåœºæ™¯å›é€€ LLMã€‚
   487â†’        """
   488â†’        event_type = trigger_config.get("event")
   489â†’        advance_days = trigger_config.get("advance_days", [0])
   490â†’
   491â†’        # ç¡®å®šæ€§äº‹ä»¶æ£€æµ‹
   492â†’        if event_type == "birthday":

   494â†’        if event_type == "solar_term":

   503â†’    def _detect_birthday(
   504â†’        self,

   507â†’    ) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[Dict], Optional[str]]:
   508â†’        """ç¡®å®šæ€§ç”Ÿæ—¥æ£€æµ‹"""
   509â†’        birth_date_str = self._get_nested_value(profile, "vibe.profile.birth_info.date")
   510â†’        if not birth_date_str:

   512â†’
   513â†’        try:

   515â†’            today = datetime.now()

   524â†’                    "days_until": days_until,
   525â†’                }, f"birthday-{this_year_birthday.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}"
   526â†’
   527â†’        except Exception:

### 1. TriggerEvaluatorï¼ˆé™æ€ä¼˜å…ˆ + LLM å›é€€ï¼‰

**æ–‡ä»¶**: `apps/api/services/proactive/trigger_evaluator.py`

**æ ¸å¿ƒåŸåˆ™**ï¼šç¡®å®šæ€§æ¡ä»¶ç”±å¹³å°è®¡ç®—ï¼Œå¤æ‚è¯­ä¹‰æ‰å›é€€ LLMã€‚

```python
"""
TriggerEvaluator - é™æ€æ±‚å€¼ä¼˜å…ˆ + LLM å›é€€

è®¾è®¡åŸåˆ™:
1. é™æ€æ¡ä»¶ï¼ˆexists/==/!=/>/< ç­‰ï¼‰ç”±å¹³å°ç›´æ¥æ±‚å€¼
2. å¤æ‚æ¡ä»¶ï¼ˆæ—  data_pathã€è‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€æè¿°ï¼‰æ‰å›é€€ LLM
3. cron åŒ¹é… + æ—¶åŒºå¤„ç† + å¹‚ç­‰é”®

ä¼˜åŠ¿:
- é™ä½å»¶è¿Ÿä¸æˆæœ¬
- é™ä½ LLM è¯¯åˆ¤é£é™©
- ä¿æŒé…ç½®é©±åŠ¨çš„çµæ´»æ€§
"""

from typing import Dict, Any, Tuple, Optional, List
from datetime import datetime, timezone
import croniter
import pytz


# å¯é™æ€æ±‚å€¼çš„æ“ä½œç¬¦
STATIC_OPERATORS = {"exists", "!exists", "==", "!=", ">", "<", ">=", "<=", "contains"}


class TriggerEvaluator:
    """é™æ€ä¼˜å…ˆ + LLM å›é€€çš„è§¦å‘è¯„ä¼°å™¨"""

    def __init__(self, llm_service=None):
        self.llm_service = llm_service

    async def evaluate(
        self,
        trigger_config: Dict[str, Any],
        profile: Dict[str, Any],
        conditions: Optional[List[Dict]] = None,
        user_timezone: str = "Asia/Shanghai",
    ) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[Dict[str, Any]], Optional[str]]:
        """
        è¯„ä¼°è§¦å‘æ¡ä»¶

        Returns:
            (triggered: bool, event_info: Optional[Dict], idempotent_key: Optional[str])
        """
        trigger_type = trigger_config.get("type")

        # 1. æ—¶é—´è§¦å‘ï¼šç¡®å®šæ€§ cron åŒ¹é…
        if trigger_type == "time_based":
            matched, bucket_key = self._evaluate_cron(
                trigger_config.get("schedule"),
                user_timezone
            )
            if not matched:
                return False, None, None
            # ç»§ç»­è¯„ä¼° conditions
            if conditions:
                cond_result = await self._evaluate_conditions(conditions, profile)
                return cond_result, None, bucket_key
            return True, None, bucket_key

        # 2. äº‹ä»¶è§¦å‘ï¼šç¡®å®šæ€§äº‹ä»¶æ£€æµ‹
        if trigger_type == "event_based":
            return await self._evaluate_event(trigger_config, profile, conditions)

        # 3. æ•°æ®æ¡ä»¶è§¦å‘
        if trigger_type == "data_condition":
            result = await self._evaluate_conditions(conditions, profile)
            return result, None, None

        return False, None, None

    def _evaluate_cron(
        self,
        schedule: str,
        user_timezone: str,
    ) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[str]]:
        """
        ç¡®å®šæ€§ cron åŒ¹é…ï¼ˆå¸¦æ—¶åŒºï¼‰

        Returns:
            (matched: bool, bucket_key: str) - bucket_key ç”¨äºå¹‚ç­‰å»é‡
        """
        if not schedule:
            return False, None

        try:
            tz = pytz.timezone(user_timezone)
            now = datetime.now(tz)

            cron = croniter.croniter(schedule, now)
            prev_time = cron.get_prev(datetime)

            # è®¡ç®—æ—¶é—´æ¡¶ï¼ˆåˆ†é’Ÿçº§ç²¾åº¦ï¼‰
            bucket_key = prev_time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M")

            # è¯¯å·®çª—å£ä¸æ‰«æé¢‘ç‡å¯¹é½ï¼ˆå‡è®¾æ¯åˆ†é’Ÿæ‰«æï¼Œè¯¯å·® â‰¤60sï¼‰
            matched = (now - prev_time).total_seconds() < 60

            return matched, bucket_key
        except Exception:
            return False, None

    async def _evaluate_conditions(
        self,
        conditions: List[Dict],
        profile: Dict[str, Any],
    ) -> bool:
        """
        æ¡ä»¶è¯„ä¼°ï¼šé™æ€ä¼˜å…ˆï¼ŒLLM å›é€€

        æµç¨‹:
        1. é¢„å¤„ç†å ä½ç¬¦ï¼ˆ{today}, {now}ï¼‰
        2. é™æ€æ¡ä»¶ç›´æ¥æ±‚å€¼
        3. å¤æ‚æ¡ä»¶å›é€€ LLM
        4. æ‰€æœ‰æ¡ä»¶ AND é€»è¾‘
        """
        if not conditions:
            return True

        static_conditions = []
        complex_conditions = []

        # åˆ†ç±»æ¡ä»¶
        for cond in conditions:
            cond = self._preprocess_condition(cond)  # æ›¿æ¢å ä½ç¬¦
            if self._is_static_condition(cond):
                static_conditions.append(cond)
            else:
                complex_conditions.append(cond)

        # 1. å…ˆæ±‚å€¼é™æ€æ¡ä»¶ï¼ˆçŸ­è·¯ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼‰
        for cond in static_conditions:
            if not self._static_eval(cond, profile):
                return False  # çŸ­è·¯ï¼šé™æ€æ¡ä»¶ä¸æ»¡è¶³ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›

        # 2. é™æ€æ¡ä»¶å…¨éƒ¨é€šè¿‡ï¼Œå†æ±‚å€¼å¤æ‚æ¡ä»¶
        if complex_conditions and self.llm_service:
            return await self._llm_eval_conditions(complex_conditions, profile)

        return True

    def _is_static_condition(self, cond: Dict) -> bool:
        """åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå¯é™æ€æ±‚å€¼çš„æ¡ä»¶"""
        return (
            "data_path" in cond and
            cond.get("operator", "exists") in STATIC_OPERATORS
        )

    def _preprocess_condition(self, cond: Dict) -> Dict:
        """é¢„å¤„ç†å ä½ç¬¦"""
        cond = cond.copy()
        if "value" in cond:
            value = str(cond["value"])
            if "{today}" in value:
                cond["value"] = value.replace("{today}", datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d"))
            if "{now}" in value:
                cond["value"] = value.replace("{now}", datetime.now().isoformat())
        return cond

    def _static_eval(self, cond: Dict, profile: Dict) -> bool:
        """é™æ€æ¡ä»¶æ±‚å€¼"""
        data_path = cond.get("data_path", "")
        operator = cond.get("operator", "exists")
        expected = cond.get("value")

        # è·å–æ•°æ®
        actual = self._get_nested_value(profile, data_path)

        # æ±‚å€¼
        if operator == "exists":
            return actual is not None
        if operator == "!exists":
            return actual is None
        if operator == "==":
            return str(actual) == str(expected)
        if operator == "!=":
            return str(actual) != str(expected)
        if operator == ">":
            return float(actual or 0) > float(expected)
        if operator == "<":
            return float(actual or 0) < float(expected)
        if operator == ">=":
            return float(actual or 0) >= float(expected)
        if operator == "<=":
            return float(actual or 0) <= float(expected)
        if operator == "contains":
            return expected in str(actual or "")

        return False

    def _get_nested_value(self, data: Dict, path: str) -> Any:
        """è·å–åµŒå¥—è·¯å¾„çš„å€¼"""
        keys = path.split(".")
        for key in keys:
            if isinstance(data, dict):
                data = data.get(key)
            else:
                return None
        return data

    async def _llm_eval_conditions(
        self,
        conditions: List[Dict],
        profile: Dict,
    ) -> bool:
        """LLM è¯„ä¼°å¤æ‚æ¡ä»¶ï¼ˆä»…ç”¨äºæ— æ³•é™æ€æ±‚å€¼çš„æƒ…å†µï¼‰"""
        # ç®€åŒ– promptï¼Œåªå‘é€ç›¸å…³æ•°æ®
        prompt = f"""åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦æ»¡è¶³ä»¥ä¸‹æ¡ä»¶ï¼ˆå…¨éƒ¨æ»¡è¶³è¿”å› trueï¼‰ï¼š

æ¡ä»¶ï¼š
{chr(10).join(f"- {c.get('description', c)}" for c in conditions)}

ç”¨æˆ·ç›¸å…³æ•°æ®ï¼š
{self._extract_relevant_data(profile, conditions)}

è¿”å› JSONï¼š{{"triggered": true/false, "reason": "..."}}"""

        result = await self.llm_service.evaluate(prompt=prompt)
        return result.get("triggered", False)

    async def _evaluate_event(
        self,
        trigger_config: Dict,
        profile: Dict,
        conditions: Optional[List[Dict]],
    ) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[Dict], Optional[str]]:
        """
        äº‹ä»¶è§¦å‘è¯„ä¼°

        ä¼˜å…ˆä½¿ç”¨ç¡®å®šæ€§è®¡ç®—ï¼ˆç”Ÿæ—¥ã€èŠ‚æ°”ç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œ
        ä»…å¯¹æ¨¡ç³Šåœºæ™¯å›é€€ LLMã€‚
        """
        event_type = trigger_config.get("event")
        advance_days = trigger_config.get("advance_days", [0])

        # ç¡®å®šæ€§äº‹ä»¶æ£€æµ‹
        if event_type == "birthday":
            return self._detect_birthday(profile, advance_days)
        if event_type == "solar_term":
            return self._detect_solar_term(advance_days)

        # å¤æ‚äº‹ä»¶å›é€€ LLM
        if self.llm_service:
            return await self._llm_detect_event(event_type, profile, conditions)

        return False, None, None

    def _detect_birthday(
        self,
        profile: Dict,
        advance_days: List[int],
    ) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[Dict], Optional[str]]:
        """ç¡®å®šæ€§ç”Ÿæ—¥æ£€æµ‹"""
        birth_date_str = self._get_nested_value(profile, "vibe.profile.birth_info.date")
        if not birth_date_str:
            return False, None, None

        try:
            birth = datetime.strptime(birth_date_str, "%Y-%m-%d")
            today = datetime.now()
            this_year_birthday = birth.replace(year=today.year)

            days_until = (this_year_birthday - today).days

            if days_until in advance_days:
                return True, {
                    "event_type": "birthday",
                    "event_date": this_year_birthday.strftime("%Y-%m-%d"),
                    "days_until": days_until,
                }, f"birthday-{this_year_birthday.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}"

        except Exception:
            pass

        return False, None, None
```

### 2. ProactiveOrchestrator

**æ–‡ä»¶**: `apps/api/services/proactive/orchestrator.py`

```python
"""
ProactiveOrchestrator - ä¸»åŠ¨æ¨é€ç¼–æ’å™¨

èŒè´£:
1. åŠ è½½ Skill çº§ reminders.yaml é…ç½®
2. è°ƒåº¦è§¦å‘è¯„ä¼°ï¼ˆé™æ€ä¼˜å…ˆ + LLM å›é€€ï¼‰
3. è°ƒç”¨ CoreAgent ç”Ÿæˆå†…å®¹
4. æŠ•é€’é€šçŸ¥

å¹³å°å±‚ç¡¬çº¦æŸ:
- é™é»˜æ—¶æ®µæ£€æŸ¥
- æ¯æ—¥æ¨é€ä¸Šé™
- å¹‚ç­‰å»é‡ï¼ˆåŸºäº bucket_keyï¼‰
- å†·å´æ—¶é—´æ£€æŸ¥
"""

from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Any
from uuid import UUID
from datetime import datetime
import logging

from .trigger_evaluator import TriggerEvaluator
from .agent_adapter import ProactiveAgentAdapter
from .models import ReminderTask, ReminderContent
from services.notification import NotificationService


class ProactiveOrchestrator:
    """ä¸»åŠ¨æ¨é€ç¼–æ’å™¨"""

    def __init__(
        self,
        trigger_evaluator: TriggerEvaluator,
        agent_adapter: ProactiveAgentAdapter,
        notification_service: NotificationService,
    ):
        self.trigger_evaluator = trigger_evaluator
        self.agent_adapter = agent_adapter
        self.notification_service = notification_service
        self._skill_configs: Dict[str, Dict] = {}
        self._load_skill_configs()
        self._idempotent_cache: Dict[str, datetime] = {}  # å¹‚ç­‰ç¼“å­˜

    async def run_scheduled_scan(self, dry_run: bool = False) -> List[Dict]:
        """å®šæ—¶æ‰«æå…¥å£"""
        results = []
        users = await self._get_users_for_current_hour()

        for user_id, profile in users:
            user_notifications = await self._process_user(user_id, profile, dry_run)
            results.extend(user_notifications)

        return results

    async def _process_user(
        self,
        user_id: UUID,
        profile: Dict,
        dry_run: bool = False,
    ) -> List[Dict]:
        """å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ¨é€"""
        notifications = []
        user_timezone = profile.get("vibe", {}).get("preferences", {}).get("timezone", "Asia/Shanghai")

        # 0. é™é»˜æ—¶æ®µæ£€æŸ¥ï¼ˆå¹³å°ç¡¬çº¦æŸï¼‰
        if self._is_quiet_hours(user_timezone):
            logging.debug(f"User {user_id} in quiet hours, skipping")
            return []

        # 0.1 æ¯æ—¥æ¨é€ä¸Šé™æ£€æŸ¥
        daily_count = await self._get_daily_push_count(user_id)
        max_daily = self._get_global_config().get("max_daily_pushes", 5)
        if daily_count >= max_daily:
            logging.debug(f"User {user_id} reached daily limit ({max_daily})")
            return []

        for skill_id, config in self._skill_configs.items():
            # 1. è®¢é˜…çŠ¶æ€æ£€æŸ¥
            if not await self._should_send_to_user(user_id, skill_id):
                continue

            for reminder in config.get("reminders", []):
                # 2. è§¦å‘è¯„ä¼°ï¼ˆé™æ€ä¼˜å…ˆ + LLM å›é€€ï¼‰
                triggered, event_info, bucket_key = await self.trigger_evaluator.evaluate(
                    trigger_config=reminder.get("trigger", {}),
                    profile=profile,
                    conditions=reminder.get("conditions"),
                    user_timezone=user_timezone,
                )

                if not triggered:
                    continue

                # 3. å¹‚ç­‰æ£€æŸ¥ï¼ˆåŸºäº bucket_keyï¼‰
                idempotent_key = f"{user_id}-{skill_id}-{reminder['id']}-{bucket_key}"
                if self._is_duplicate(idempotent_key):
                    logging.debug(f"Duplicate: {idempotent_key}")
                    continue

                # 4. å†·å´æ£€æŸ¥
                if not await self._check_cooldown(user_id, skill_id, reminder["id"]):
                    continue

                # 5. ç”Ÿæˆå†…å®¹ï¼ˆè°ƒç”¨ Agentï¼‰
                content = await self.agent_adapter.generate_content(
                    user_id=str(user_id),
                    profile=profile,
                    skill_id=skill_id,
                    reminder=reminder,
                    event_info=event_info,
                )

                # 6. ä¿å­˜é€šçŸ¥
                if not dry_run:
                    await self.notification_service.save(
                        user_id=user_id,
                        notification_type=f"{skill_id}_{reminder['id']}",
                        title=content.title,
                        content=content.to_dict(),
                    )
                    self._mark_sent(idempotent_key)

                notifications.append({
                    "user_id": str(user_id),
                    "skill_id": skill_id,
                    "reminder_id": reminder["id"],
                    "title": content.title,
                    "triggered_reason": event_info,  # è®°å½•è§¦å‘åŸå› 
                })

        return notifications

    def _is_quiet_hours(self, user_timezone: str) -> bool:
        """é™é»˜æ—¶æ®µæ£€æŸ¥"""
        import pytz
        tz = pytz.timezone(user_timezone)
        now = datetime.now(tz)
        hour = now.hour

        global_config = self._get_global_config()
        quiet_start = global_config.get("quiet_hours", {}).get("start", 22)
        quiet_end = global_config.get("quiet_hours", {}).get("end", 7)
```

from typing import Dict, Any, Optional

        æµç¨‹:

    def _build_proactive_prompt(

            f"1. è¯»å–è§„åˆ™æ–‡ä»¶ `{rule_path}` ä¸­çš„ç”Ÿæˆè¦æ±‚",
            f"2. æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·ç”»åƒå’Œè§¦å‘äº‹ä»¶ç”Ÿæˆä¸ªæ€§åŒ–æ¨é€å†…å®¹",
            f"3. è¾“å‡º JSON æ ¼å¼ï¼š",
            f"```json",
            f'{{',
            f'  "title": "æ¨é€æ ‡é¢˜ï¼ˆâ‰¤20å­—ï¼‰",',
            f'  "body": "æ¨é€æ­£æ–‡ï¼ˆâ‰¤100å­—ï¼‰",',
            f'  "fortune_hint": "å¯é€‰ï¼Œè¿åŠ¿æç¤º",',
            f'  "action_tip": "å¯é€‰ï¼Œè¡ŒåŠ¨å»ºè®®"',
            f'}}',

        return "\n".join(prompt_parts)

    def _build_profile_summary(self, profile: Dict) -> str:
        """
        æ„å»ºç”¨æˆ·ç”»åƒæ‘˜è¦

        ç»Ÿä¸€ä½¿ç”¨ vibe.* è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆä¸ VibeProfile v2.0 ä¸€è‡´ï¼‰
        """
        lines = []
        vibe = profile.get("vibe", {})

        # èº«ä»½ä¿¡æ¯ - vibe.profile.birth_info
        profile_data = vibe.get("profile", {})
        if birth := profile_data.get("birth_info"):

        # çŠ¶æ€ - vibe.state
        state = vibe.get("state", {})
        if focus := state.get("focus"):
            lines.append(f"- å…³æ³¨é¢†åŸŸ: {', '.join(focus)}")
        if emotion := state.get("emotion"):
            lines.append(f"- å½“å‰æƒ…ç»ª: {emotion}")

        # ç›®æ ‡ - vibe.goalsï¼ˆç»Ÿä¸€è·¯å¾„ï¼‰

    def _extract_content(

        """

                    "fortune_hint": str(data.get("fortune_hint", ""))[:50] if data.get("fortune_hint") else None,
                    "action_tip": str(data.get("action_tip", ""))[:50] if data.get("action_tip") else None,

        # 3. å…œåº•æ¨¡æ¿
        if not data or not data.get("title"):

                "body": "ç‚¹å‡»æŸ¥çœ‹è¯¦æƒ…",
            }
            logging.warning(f"Using fallback template for reminder: {reminder.get('id')}")

        # é™„åŠ å¯¹è¯å¼•å¯¼
        content_config = reminder.get("content", {})

        return ReminderContent(
            title=data.get("title"),
            body=data.get("body", ""),
            fortune_hint=data.get("fortune_hint"),
            action_tip=data.get("action_tip"),

   210â†’    async def _get_users_for_current_hour(self) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:

   212â†’        è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶æ®µåº”è¯¥æ¨é€çš„ç”¨æˆ·
   213â†’
   214â†’        v7.6 æ”¹è¿›: ä» unified_profiles è¯»å–æ¨é€åå¥½

   222â†’        # v7.6: æŸ¥è¯¢ä»˜è´¹ç”¨æˆ·åŠå…¶ Profileï¼ˆæ¨é€åå¥½ç°åœ¨åœ¨ profile å†…ï¼‰
   223â†’        query = """

   242â†’                # v7.6: ä» profile.preferences.push_settings è·å–æ¨é€åå¥½
   243â†’                push_settings = preferences.get("push_settings", {})
   244â†’                user_push_hour = push_settings.get("default_push_hour", self.DEFAULT_PUSH_HOUR)
   245â†’                quiet_start = push_settings.get("quiet_start_hour", 22)

   247â†’

   251â†’
   252â†’                    # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åœ¨é™é»˜æ—¶æ®µ
   253â†’                    is_quiet = False

   256â†’                    else:

   258â†’

   261â†’
   262â†’                    # æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·æœ¬åœ°æ—¶é—´æ˜¯å¦åŒ¹é…å…¶æ¨é€æ—¶é—´
   263â†’                    if user_time.hour == user_push_hour:
   264â†’                        users.append({
   265â†’                            "user_id": row["user_id"],
   266â†’                            "profile": profile,
   267â†’                            "timezone": tz_name,
   268â†’                            "local_hour": user_time.hour,
   269â†’                            "push_hour": user_push_hour,
   270â†’                        })
   271â†’                except Exception:
   272â†’                    # é»˜è®¤ä½¿ç”¨ Asia/Shanghai (UTC+8)
   273â†’                    default_hour = (now_utc.hour + 8) % 24
   274â†’                    if default_hour == user_push_hour:
   275â†’                        users.append({
   276â†’                            "user_id": row["user_id"],
   277â†’                            "profile": profile,
   278â†’                            "timezone": "Asia/Shanghai",
   279â†’                            "local_hour": default_hour,
   280â†’                            "push_hour": user_push_hour,
   281â†’                        })
   282â†’        except Exception as e:
   283â†’            logger.error(f"Failed to get users: {e}")
   284â†’
   285â†’        return users

   293â†’        æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åº”è¯¥å‘é€æ¨é€
   294â†’
   295â†’        åŸºäº Skill è®¢é˜…çŠ¶æ€å†³å®šï¼š

   297â†’        - Default Skill: æœªå–æ¶ˆè®¢é˜…ä¸” push_enabled æ—¶å‘é€

   340â†’            if not await self._should_send_to_user(user_id, skill_id):

   344â†’            reminders = config.get("reminders") or config.get("reminder_types", [])
   345â†’
   346â†’            # è·å– Skill çº§åˆ«çš„ cooldown é…ç½®
   347â†’            global_config = config.get("global_config", {})
   348â†’            default_cooldown = global_config.get("cooldown_hours", 24)
   349â†’
   350â†’            for reminder in reminders:
   351â†’                trigger_config = reminder.get("trigger", {})
   352â†’                reminder_id = reminder.get("id", "unknown")
   353â†’                conditions = reminder.get("conditions", [])  # è·å–é¢å¤–æ¡ä»¶
   354â†’
   355â†’                try:
   356â†’                    # æ£€æµ‹è§¦å‘æ¡ä»¶ (åŒ…æ‹¬ conditions)
   357â†’                    should_trigger, event_info = await self.trigger_detector.should_trigger(
   358â†’                        trigger_config=trigger_config,
   359â†’                        profile=profile,
   360â†’                        skill_id=skill_id,
   361â†’                        conditions=conditions,  # ä¼ é€’æ¡ä»¶
   362â†’                    )
   363â†’
   364â†’                    if should_trigger:
   365â†’                        # æ£€æŸ¥ cooldownï¼ˆæ”¯æŒ trigger çº§åˆ«å’Œ skill çº§åˆ«é…ç½®ï¼‰
   366â†’                        cooldown_hours = trigger_config.get("cooldown_hours", default_cooldown)
   367â†’                        notification_type = f"{skill_id}_{reminder_id}"
   368â†’
   369â†’                        if not await self._notification_service.check_cooldown(
   370â†’                            user_id=user_id,
   371â†’                            notification_type=notification_type,
   372â†’                            cooldown_hours=cooldown_hours,
   373â†’                        ):
   374â†’                            logger.debug(f"Cooldown active for {notification_type}, skipping")
   375â†’                            continue
   376â†’
   377â†’                        tasks.append(ReminderTask(
   378â†’                            user_id=user_id,
   379â†’                            skill_id=skill_id,
   380â†’                            reminder_type=reminder_id,
   381â†’                            priority=ReminderPriority(reminder.get("priority", "medium")),
   382â†’                            trigger_event=event_info.get("event_name") if event_info else None,
   383â†’                            trigger_date=event_info.get("event_date") if event_info else date.today(),
   384â†’                            metadata={"config": reminder, "event_info": event_info},
   385â†’                        ))
   386â†’                except Exception as e:
   387â†’                    logger.error(f"Failed to check trigger {reminder_id} for user {user_id}: {e}")
   388â†’
   389â†’        return tasks
   390â†’
   391â†’    def _get_reminder_config(self, skill_config: Dict, reminder_type: str) -> Dict:
   392â†’        """è·å–ç‰¹å®šæé†’ç±»å‹çš„é…ç½®"""
   393â†’        # æ”¯æŒæ–°æ—§é…ç½®æ ¼å¼
   394â†’        reminders = skill_config.get("reminders") or skill_config.get("reminder_types", [])
   395â†’        for reminder in reminders:
   396â†’            if reminder["id"] == reminder_type:
   397â†’                return reminder
   398â†’        return {}
   399â†’

   401â†’        """è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ Skill é…ç½® (ç”¨äºè°ƒè¯•)"""
   402â†’        return self._skill_configs
   403â†’

   408â†’

1â†’"""
     2â†’Proactive System Data Models
     3â†’
     4â†’Data classes for the proactive notification system.
     5â†’Extracted from engine.py for modularity.
     6â†’"""
     7â†’
     8â†’from dataclasses import dataclass, field
     9â†’from datetime import date
    10â†’from enum import Enum
    11â†’from typing import Dict, Any, Optional, List
    12â†’from uuid import UUID
    13â†’
    14â†’
    15â†’class ReminderPriority(str, Enum):
    16â†’    """Reminder priority levels"""
    17â†’    LOW = "low"
    18â†’    MEDIUM = "medium"
    19â†’    HIGH = "high"
    20â†’    URGENT = "urgent"
    21â†’
    22â†’
    23â†’@dataclass
    24â†’class ReminderTask:
    25â†’    """A reminder task to be processed"""
    26â†’    user_id: UUID
    27â†’    skill_id: str
    28â†’    reminder_type: str
    29â†’    priority: ReminderPriority = ReminderPriority.MEDIUM
    30â†’    trigger_event: Optional[str] = None
    31â†’    trigger_date: Optional[date] = None
    32â†’    metadata: Dict[str, Any] = field(default_factory=dict)
    33â†’
    34â†’
    35â†’@dataclass
    36â†’class ReminderContent:
    37â†’    """Generated reminder content for notification"""
    38â†’    title: str
    39â†’    body: str = ""
    40â†’    data: Dict[str, Any] = field(default_factory=dict)
    41â†’    card_type: Optional[str] = None
    42â†’    # Optional fields from Agent generation
    43â†’    fortune_hint: Optional[str] = None
    44â†’    action_tip: Optional[str] = None
    45â†’    # Conversation guidance fields
    46â†’    suggested_prompt: Optional[str] = None
    47â†’    quick_actions: List[Dict[str, str]] = field(default_factory=list)
    48â†’
    49â†’    def to_dict(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    50â†’        """Convert to dictionary for notification storage"""
    51â†’        result = {
    52â†’            "title": self.title,
    53â†’            "body": self.body,
    54â†’            **self.data,
    55â†’        }
    56â†’        if self.card_type:
    57â†’            result["card_type"] = self.card_type
    58â†’        if self.fortune_hint:
    59â†’            result["fortune_hint"] = self.fortune_hint
    60â†’        if self.action_tip:
    61â†’            result["action_tip"] = self.action_tip
    62â†’        if self.suggested_prompt:
    63â†’            result["suggested_prompt"] = self.suggested_prompt
    64â†’        if self.quick_actions:
    65â†’            result["quick_actions"] = self.quick_actions
    66â†’        return result
    67â†’

content.content:
1â†’"""
     2â†’ProactiveOrchestrator - Main Proactive Push Orchestrator
     3â†’
     4â†’Responsibilities:
     5â†’1. Load Skill-level reminders.yaml configurations
     6â†’2. Schedule trigger evaluation (static-first + LLM fallback)
     7â†’3. Call CoreAgent for content generation
     8â†’4. Deliver notifications
     9â†’
    10â†’Platform-level hard constraints:
    11â†’- Quiet hours checking
    12â†’- Daily push limit
    13â†’- Idempotent deduplication (bucket_key based)
    14â†’- Cooldown time checking
    15â†’"""
    16â†’
    17â†’from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Any
    18â†’from uuid import UUID
    19â†’from datetime import datetime, timedelta
    20â†’import logging
    21â†’import yaml
    22â†’from pathlib import Path
    23â†’
    24â†’import pytz
    25â†’
    26â†’from .trigger_evaluator import TriggerEvaluator
    27â†’from .models import ReminderContent
    28â†’
    29â†’logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    30â†’
    31â†’
    32â†’class ProactiveOrchestrator:
    33â†’    """Main proactive push orchestrator"""
    34â†’
    35â†’    # Default configuration values
    36â†’    DEFAULT_MAX_DAILY_PUSHES = 5
    37â†’    DEFAULT_QUIET_START = 22
    38â†’    DEFAULT_QUIET_END = 7
    39â†’    IDEMPOTENT_TTL_HOURS = 48
    40â†’
    41â†’    def __init__(
    42â†’        self,
    43â†’        trigger_evaluator: TriggerEvaluator,
    44â†’        agent_adapter: Any,  # ProactiveAgentAdapter
    45â†’        notification_service: Any,  # NotificationService
    46â†’    ):
    47â†’        """
    48â†’        Initialize orchestrator.
    49â†’
    50â†’        Args:
    51â†’            trigger_evaluator: TriggerEvaluator instance for trigger detection
    52â†’            agent_adapter: ProactiveAgentAdapter instance for content generation
    53â†’            notification_service: NotificationService for saving/sending notifications
    54â†’        """
    55â†’        self.trigger_evaluator = trigger_evaluator
    56â†’        self.agent_adapter = agent_adapter
    57â†’        self.notification_service = notification_service
    58â†’        self._skill_configs: Dict[str, Dict] = {}
    59â†’        self._idempotent_cache: Dict[str, datetime] = {}  # Idempotent cache
    60â†’        self._load_skill_configs()
    61â†’
    62â†’    def _load_skill_configs(self):
    63â†’        """Load all Skill reminders.yaml configurations"""
    64â†’        skills_dir = Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent / "skills"
    65â†’
    66â†’        if not skills_dir.exists():
    67â†’            logger.warning(f"Skills directory not found: {skills_dir}")
    68â†’            return
    69â†’
    70â†’        for skill_dir in skills_dir.iterdir():
    71â†’            if skill_dir.is_dir():
    72â†’                reminders_file = skill_dir / "reminders.yaml"
    73â†’                if reminders_file.exists():
    74â†’                    try:
    75â†’                        with open(reminders_file, encoding="utf-8") as f:
    76â†’                            config = yaml.safe_load(f)
    77â†’                            if config and "skill_id" in config:
    78â†’                                self._skill_configs[config["skill_id"]] = config
    79â†’                                logger.info(f"Loaded reminders config for skill: {config['skill_id']}")
    80â†’                    except Exception as e:
    81â†’                        logger.error(f"Failed to load {reminders_file}: {e}")
    82â†’
    83â†’        logger.info(f"Loaded {len(self._skill_configs)} skill reminder configs")
    84â†’
    85â†’    def _get_global_config(self, skill_id: Optional[str] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    86â†’        """
    87â†’        Get global config with defaults.
    88â†’
    89â†’        Args:
    90â†’            skill_id: Optional skill ID to get skill-specific config
    91â†’
    92â†’        Returns:
    93â†’            Global configuration dictionary
    94â†’        """
    95â†’        # Default config
    96â†’        config = {
    97â†’            "max_daily_pushes": self.DEFAULT_MAX_DAILY_PUSHES,
    98â†’            "quiet_hours": {
    99â†’                "start": self.DEFAULT_QUIET_START,
   100â†’                "end": self.DEFAULT_QUIET_END,
   101â†’            },
   102â†’            "cooldown_hours": 24,
   103â†’        }
   104â†’
   105â†’        # Merge skill-specific config if available
   106â†’        if skill_id and skill_id in self._skill_configs:
   107â†’            skill_global = self._skill_configs[skill_id].get("global_config", {})
   108â†’            config.update(skill_global)
   109â†’
   110â†’        return config
   111â†’
   112â†’    async def run_scheduled_scan(self, dry_run: bool = False) -> List[Dict]:
   113â†’        """
   114â†’        Scheduled scan entry point.
   115â†’
   116â†’        Args:
   117â†’            dry_run: If True, don't save notifications
   118â†’
   119â†’        Returns:
   120â†’            List of generated notifications
   121â†’        """
   122â†’        results = []
   123â†’        users = await self._get_users_for_current_hour()
   124â†’
   125â†’        for user_id, profile in users:
   126â†’            try:
   127â†’                user_notifications = await self._process_user(user_id, profile, dry_run)
   128â†’                results.extend(user_notifications)
   129â†’            except Exception as e:
   130â†’                logger.error(f"Failed to process user {user_id}: {e}")
   131â†’
   132â†’        return results
   133â†’
   134â†’    async def _get_users_for_current_hour(self) -> List[tuple]:
   135â†’        """
   136â†’        Get users that should receive notifications this hour.
   137â†’
   138â†’        Returns:
   139â†’            List of (user_id, profile) tuples
   140â†’        """
   141â†’        # This would query the database for active users
   142â†’        # For now, return empty list - actual implementation would use UnifiedProfileRepository
   143â†’        from stores.db import get_connection
   144â†’        from stores.unified_profile_repo import UnifiedProfileRepository
   145â†’
   146â†’        now_utc = datetime.now(pytz.UTC)
   147â†’        users = []
   148â†’
   149â†’        try:
   150â†’            async with get_connection() as conn:
   151â†’                query = """
   152â†’                    SELECT
   153â†’                        u.id as user_id,
   154â†’                        up.profile
   155â†’                    FROM vibe_users u
   156â†’                    JOIN unified_profiles up ON up.user_id = u.id
   157â†’                    WHERE u.subscription_status = 'active'
   158â†’                """
   159â†’                rows = await conn.fetch(query)
   160â†’
   161â†’            for row in rows:
   162â†’                profile = row["profile"] if isinstance(row["profile"], dict) else {}
   163â†’                users.append((row["user_id"], profile))
   164â†’        except Exception as e:
   165â†’            logger.error(f"Failed to get users: {e}")
   166â†’
   167â†’        return users
   168â†’
   169â†’    async def _process_user(
   170â†’        self,
   171â†’        user_id: UUID,
   172â†’        profile: Dict,
   173â†’        dry_run: bool = False,
   174â†’    ) -> List[Dict]:
   175â†’        """
   176â†’        Process a single user for all potential notifications.
   177â†’
   178â†’        Args:
   179â†’            user_id: User ID
   180â†’            profile: User profile data
   181â†’            dry_run: If True, don't save notifications
   182â†’
   183â†’        Returns:
   184â†’            List of generated notification info
   185â†’        """
   186â†’        notifications = []
   187â†’        # Timezone å¯èƒ½åœ¨ preferences.timezone æˆ– vibe.preferences.timezone
   188â†’        user_timezone = (
   189â†’            profile.get("preferences", {}).get("timezone") or
   190â†’            profile.get("vibe", {}).get("preferences", {}).get("timezone") or
   191â†’            "Asia/Shanghai"
   192â†’        )
   193â†’
   194â†’        # 0. Quiet hours check (platform constraint)
   195â†’        if self._is_quiet_hours(user_timezone):
   196â†’            logger.debug(f"User {user_id} in quiet hours, skipping")
   197â†’            return []
   198â†’
   199â†’        # 0.1 Daily push limit check
   200â†’        daily_count = await self._get_daily_push_count(user_id)
   201â†’        max_daily = self._get_global_config().get("max_daily_pushes", self.DEFAULT_MAX_DAILY_PUSHES)
   202â†’        if daily_count >= max_daily:
   203â†’            logger.debug(f"User {user_id} reached daily limit ({max_daily})")
   204â†’            return []
   205â†’
   206â†’        for skill_id, config in self._skill_configs.items():
   207â†’            # Skip disabled skills
   208â†’            if not config.get("enabled", True):
   209â†’                continue
   210â†’
   211â†’            # 1. Subscription status check
   212â†’            if not await self._should_send_to_user(user_id, skill_id):
   213â†’                continue
   214â†’
   215â†’            for reminder in config.get("reminders", []):
   216â†’                try:
   217â†’                    # 2. Trigger evaluation (static-first + LLM fallback)
   218â†’                    triggered, event_info, bucket_key = await self.trigger_evaluator.evaluate(
   219â†’                        trigger_config=reminder.get("trigger", {}),
   220â†’                        profile=profile,
   221â†’                        conditions=reminder.get("conditions"),
   222â†’                        user_timezone=user_timezone,
   223â†’                    )
   224â†’
   225â†’                    if not triggered:
   226â†’                        continue
   227â†’
   228â†’                    # 3. Idempotent check (bucket_key based)
   229â†’                    bucket = bucket_key or (event_info or {}).get("event_date") or datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
   230â†’                    idempotent_key = f"{user_id}-{skill_id}-{reminder['id']}-{bucket}"
   231â†’                    if self._is_duplicate(idempotent_key):
   232â†’                        logger.debug(f"Duplicate: {idempotent_key}")
   233â†’                        continue
   234â†’
   235â†’                    # 4. Cooldown check
   236â†’                    cooldown_override = reminder.get("trigger", {}).get("cooldown_hours")
   237â†’                    if not await self._check_cooldown(user_id, skill_id, reminder["id"], cooldown_override):
   238â†’                        continue
   239â†’
   240â†’                    # 5. Generate content (call Agent)
   241â†’                    content = await self.agent_adapter.generate_content(
   242â†’                        user_id=str(user_id),
   243â†’                        profile=profile,
   244â†’                        skill_id=skill_id,
   245â†’                        reminder=reminder,
   246â†’                        event_info=event_info,
   247â†’                    )
   248â†’
   249â†’                    # 6. Save notification
   250â†’                    if not dry_run:
   251â†’                        await self.notification_service.save(
   252â†’                            user_id=user_id,
   253â†’                            notification_type=f"{skill_id}_{reminder['id']}",
   254â†’                            title=content.title,
   255â†’                            content=content.to_dict(),
   256â†’                        )
   257â†’                        self._mark_sent(idempotent_key)
   258â†’
   259â†’                    notifications.append({
   260â†’                        "user_id": str(user_id),
   261â†’                        "skill_id": skill_id,
   262â†’                        "reminder_id": reminder["id"],
   263â†’                        "title": content.title,
   264â†’                        "triggered_reason": event_info,
   265â†’                    })
   266â†’
   267â†’                except Exception as e:
   268â†’                    logger.error(f"Failed to process reminder {reminder.get('id')} for user {user_id}: {e}")
   269â†’
   270â†’        return notifications
   271â†’
   272â†’    def _is_quiet_hours(self, user_timezone: str) -> bool:
   273â†’        """
   274â†’        Check if current time is in quiet hours.
   275â†’
   276â†’        Args:
   277â†’            user_timezone: User's timezone string
   278â†’
   279â†’        Returns:
   280â†’            True if in quiet hours
   281â†’        """
   282â†’        try:
   283â†’            tz = pytz.timezone(user_timezone)
   284â†’            now = datetime.now(tz)
   285â†’            hour = now.hour
   286â†’
   287â†’            global_config = self._get_global_config()
   288â†’            quiet_start = global_config.get("quiet_hours", {}).get("start", self.DEFAULT_QUIET_START)
   289â†’            quiet_end = global_config.get("quiet_hours", {}).get("end", self.DEFAULT_QUIET_END)
   290â†’
   291â†’            if quiet_start > quiet_end:  # Crosses midnight
   292â†’                return hour >= quiet_start or hour < quiet_end
   293â†’            return quiet_start <= hour < quiet_end
   294â†’        except Exception:
   295â†’            # Default to not quiet if timezone parsing fails
   296â†’            return False
   297â†’
   298â†’    def _is_duplicate(self, idempotent_key: str) -> bool:
   299â†’        """
   300â†’        Check if this is a duplicate send.
   301â†’
   302â†’        Args:
   303â†’            idempotent_key: Key for deduplication
   304â†’
   305â†’        Returns:
   306â†’            True if duplicate

   308â†’        self._prune_idempotent_cache()
   309â†’        return idempotent_key in self._idempotent_cache
   310â†’
   311â†’    def _mark_sent(self, idempotent_key: str):
   312â†’        """
   313â†’        Mark a notification as sent.
   314â†’
   315â†’        Args:
   316â†’            idempotent_key: Key to mark as sent

   318â†’        self._idempotent_cache[idempotent_key] = datetime.now()
   319â†’        self._prune_idempotent_cache()
   320â†’
   321â†’    def _prune_idempotent_cache(self):
   322â†’        """Prune old idempotent keys"""
   323â†’        if not self._idempotent_cache:
   324â†’            return
   325â†’        threshold = datetime.now() - timedelta(hours=self.IDEMPOTENT_TTL_HOURS)
   326â†’        to_delete = [k for k, v in self._idempotent_cache.items() if v < threshold]
   327â†’        for k in to_delete:
   328â†’            self._idempotent_cache.pop(k, None)

   330â†’    async def _get_daily_push_count(self, user_id: UUID) -> int:

   375â†’
   376â†’            if category == "default":

   383â†’            # Professional skills require subscription

1â†’'use client'
     2â†’
     3â†’/**
     4â†’ * Onboarding Context - v2.1
     5â†’ *
     6â†’ * ç®¡ç†æ•´ä¸ª onboarding æµç¨‹çš„çŠ¶æ€
     7â†’ */
     8â†’
     9â†’import React, { createContext, useContext, useReducer, useCallback, ReactNode } from 'react'
    10â†’import type {
    11â†’  OnboardingStep,
    12â†’  OnboardingState,
    13â†’  BirthInfo,
    14â†’  ConcernType,
    15â†’  PersonaType,
    16â†’  BaziData,
    17â†’  InterviewAnswer,
    18â†’} from './types'
    19â†’
    20â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    21â†’// State & Actions
    22â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    23â†’
    24â†’const initialState: OnboardingState = {
    25â†’  step: 'landing',
    26â†’  birthInfo: null,
    27â†’  concerns: [],
    28â†’  gender: null,
    29â†’  persona: null,
    30â†’  baziData: null,
    31â†’  interviewAnswers: [],
    32â†’  letterContent: null,
    33â†’}
    34â†’
    35â†’type Action =
    36â†’  | { type: 'SET_STEP'; payload: OnboardingStep }
    37â†’  | { type: 'SET_BIRTH_INFO'; payload: BirthInfo }
    38â†’  | { type: 'SET_CONCERNS'; payload: ConcernType[] }
    39â†’  | { type: 'SET_GENDER'; payload: string }
    40â†’  | { type: 'SET_PERSONA'; payload: PersonaType }
    41â†’  | { type: 'SET_BAZI_DATA'; payload: BaziData }
    42â†’  | { type: 'ADD_INTERVIEW_ANSWER'; payload: InterviewAnswer }
    43â†’  | { type: 'SET_LETTER_CONTENT'; payload: string }
    44â†’  | { type: 'RESET' }
    45â†’
    46â†’function reducer(state: OnboardingState, action: Action): OnboardingState {
    47â†’  switch (action.type) {
    48â†’    case 'SET_STEP':
    49â†’      return { ...state, step: action.payload }
    50â†’    case 'SET_BIRTH_INFO':
    51â†’      return { ...state, birthInfo: action.payload }
    52â†’    case 'SET_CONCERNS':
    53â†’      return { ...state, concerns: action.payload }
    54â†’    case 'SET_GENDER':
    55â†’      return { ...state, gender: action.payload }
    56â†’    case 'SET_PERSONA':
    57â†’      return { ...state, persona: action.payload }
    58â†’    case 'SET_BAZI_DATA':
    59â†’      return { ...state, baziData: action.payload }
    60â†’    case 'ADD_INTERVIEW_ANSWER':
    61â†’      return {
    62â†’        ...state,
    63â†’        interviewAnswers: [...state.interviewAnswers, action.payload],
    64â†’      }
    65â†’    case 'SET_LETTER_CONTENT':
    66â†’      return { ...state, letterContent: action.payload }
    67â†’    case 'RESET':
    68â†’      return initialState
    69â†’    default:
    70â†’      return state
    71â†’  }
    72â†’}
    73â†’
    74â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    75â†’// Context
    76â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    77â†’
    78â†’interface OnboardingContextValue {
    79â†’  state: OnboardingState
    80â†’  // Navigation
    81â†’  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
    82â†’  nextStep: () => void
    83â†’  // Data setters
    84â†’  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
    85â†’  setConcerns: (concerns: ConcernType[]) => void
    86â†’  setGender: (gender: string) => void
    87â†’  setPersona: (persona: PersonaType) => void
    88â†’  setBaziData: (data: BaziData) => void
    89â†’  addInterviewAnswer: (answer: InterviewAnswer) => void
    90â†’  setLetterContent: (content: string) => void
    91â†’  // Utils
    92â†’  reset: () => void
    93â†’}
    94â†’
    95â†’const OnboardingContext = createContext<OnboardingContextValue | null>(null)
    96â†’
    97â†’// Step order for nextStep navigation (v4.0: 90ç§’æ—…ç¨‹)
    98â†’// Phase 1: ç›¸é‡ (landing) -> Phase 2: æ´å¯Ÿ (loading) -> Phase 3: å…±é¸£ (aha) -> Phase 4: æœŸå¾… (conversion)
    99â†’const STEP_ORDER: OnboardingStep[] = [
   100â†’  'landing',    // 0-15ç§’: è¾“å…¥ç”Ÿæ—¥
   101â†’  'loading',    // 15-45ç§’: å…«å­—æ’ç›˜ + æ˜Ÿåº§åˆ†æ
   102â†’  'aha',        // 45-75ç§’: æ ¸å¿ƒæ´å¯Ÿ + Identity Prism é¢„è§ˆ
   103â†’  'conversion', // 75-90ç§’: ä»Šæ—¥è¿åŠ¿é¢„è§ˆ + ä»˜è´¹å¼•å¯¼
   104â†’]
   105â†’
   106â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   107â†’// Provider
   108â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   109â†’
   110â†’export function OnboardingProvider({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) {
   111â†’  const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState)
   112â†’
   113â†’  const goToStep = useCallback((step: OnboardingStep) => {
   114â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_STEP', payload: step })
   115â†’  }, [])
   116â†’
   117â†’  const nextStep = useCallback(() => {
   118â†’    const currentIndex = STEP_ORDER.indexOf(state.step)
   119â†’    if (currentIndex < STEP_ORDER.length - 1) {
   120â†’      dispatch({ type: 'SET_STEP', payload: STEP_ORDER[currentIndex + 1] })
   121â†’    }
   122â†’  }, [state.step])
   123â†’
   124â†’  const setBirthInfo = useCallback((info: BirthInfo) => {
   125â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_BIRTH_INFO', payload: info })
   126â†’  }, [])
   127â†’
   128â†’  const setConcerns = useCallback((concerns: ConcernType[]) => {
   129â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_CONCERNS', payload: concerns })
   130â†’  }, [])
   131â†’
   132â†’  const setGender = useCallback((gender: string) => {
   133â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_GENDER', payload: gender })
   134â†’  }, [])
   135â†’
   136â†’  const setPersona = useCallback((persona: PersonaType) => {
   137â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_PERSONA', payload: persona })
   138â†’  }, [])
   139â†’
   140â†’  const setBaziData = useCallback((data: BaziData) => {
   141â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_BAZI_DATA', payload: data })
   142â†’  }, [])
   143â†’
   144â†’  const addInterviewAnswer = useCallback((answer: InterviewAnswer) => {
   145â†’    dispatch({ type: 'ADD_INTERVIEW_ANSWER', payload: answer })
   146â†’  }, [])
   147â†’
   148â†’  const setLetterContent = useCallback((content: string) => {
   149â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_LETTER_CONTENT', payload: content })
   150â†’  }, [])
   151â†’
   152â†’  const reset = useCallback(() => {
   153â†’    dispatch({ type: 'RESET' })
   154â†’  }, [])
   155â†’
   156â†’  const value: OnboardingContextValue = {
   157â†’    state,
   158â†’    goToStep,
   159â†’    nextStep,
   160â†’    setBirthInfo,
   161â†’    setConcerns,
   162â†’    setGender,
   163â†’    setPersona,
   164â†’    setBaziData,
   165â†’    addInterviewAnswer,
   166â†’    setLetterContent,
   167â†’    reset,
   168â†’  }
   169â†’
   170â†’  return (
   171â†’    <OnboardingContext.Provider value={value}>
   172â†’      {children}
   173â†’    </OnboardingContext.Provider>
   174â†’  )
   175â†’}
   176â†’
   177â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   178â†’// Hook
   179â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   180â†’
   181â†’export function useOnboarding() {
   182â†’  const context = useContext(OnboardingContext)
   183â†’  if (!context) {
   184â†’    throw new Error('useOnboarding must be used within OnboardingProvider')
   185â†’  }
   186â†’  return context
   187â†’}
   188â†’

    99â†’const STEP_ORDER: OnboardingStep[] = [

   110â†’export function OnboardingProvider({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) {

   119â†’    if (currentIndex < STEP_ORDER.length - 1) {

```typescript
interface FirstMeetingStepProps {

}

export function FirstMeetingStep({ baziData, onComplete }: FirstMeetingStepProps) {
  const [phase, setPhase] = useState<'insights' | 'feedback' | 'guidance' | 'conversation' | 'promise'>('insights')

  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true)

  // 1. åŠ è½½æ´å¯Ÿ
  useEffect(() => {

  // 2. æ¸²æŸ“ä¸åŒé˜¶æ®µ
  switch (phase) {
    case 'insights':
      return <InsightsDisplay insights={insights} onFeedback={handleFeedback} />
    case 'feedback':
      return <FeedbackCollection onNext={() => setPhase('guidance')} />
    case 'guidance':
      return <GuidanceSelection onSelect={handleGuidanceSelect} />
    case 'conversation':
      return <ChatInterface initialPrompt={guidancePrompt} />
    case 'promise':
      return <PromiseDisplay onComplete={onComplete} />
  }
}
```

```typescript
// apps/web/src/components/onboarding/FirstMeetingStep.tsx

interface FirstMeetingStepProps {
  baziData: BaziData
  onComplete: () => void
}

export function FirstMeetingStep({ baziData, onComplete }: FirstMeetingStepProps) {
  const [phase, setPhase] = useState<'insights' | 'feedback' | 'guidance' | 'conversation' | 'promise'>('insights')
  const [insights, setInsights] = useState<Insight[]>([])
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true)

  // 1. åŠ è½½æ´å¯Ÿ
  useEffect(() => {
    generateInsights(baziData).then(setInsights)
  }, [baziData])

  // 2. æ¸²æŸ“ä¸åŒé˜¶æ®µ
  switch (phase) {
    case 'insights':
      return <InsightsDisplay insights={insights} onFeedback={handleFeedback} />
    case 'feedback':
      return <FeedbackCollection onNext={() => setPhase('guidance')} />
    case 'guidance':
      return <GuidanceSelection onSelect={handleGuidanceSelect} />
    case 'conversation':
      return <ChatInterface initialPrompt={guidancePrompt} />
    case 'promise':
      return <PromiseDisplay onComplete={onComplete} />
  }
}
```

```python
# apps/api/routes/first_meeting.py
```
